pr_title: KAPT complementary fix for missed edge case in https://github.com/realm/realm-java/pull/7220

timeline.message: Fixes a missed edge case for https://github.com/realm/realm-java/issues/7213

timeline.bodyText: Is this true? I don't see that anywhere in this PR?
timeline.author: cmelchior
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,3 +1,25 @@
+## 10.1.2 (YYYY-MM-DD)
+
+### Breaking Changes
+* None.
+
+### Enhancements
+* None.
+
+### Fixes
+* Complementary fix for missed edge case in https://github.com/realm/realm-java/pull/7220 where KAPT crash if we process a RealmObject referencing a type in RealmList defined in another module. (Issue [#7213](https://github.com/realm/realm-java/issues/7213), since v10.0.0).
+
+### Compatibility
+* File format: Generates Realms with format v20. Unsynced Realms will be upgraded from Realm Java 2.0 and later. Synced Realms can only be read and upgraded if created with Realm Java v10.0.0-BETA.1.
+* APIs are backwards compatible with all previous release of realm-java in the 10.x.y series.
+* Realm Studio 10.0.0 or above is required to open Realms created by this version.
+
+### Internal
+* Updated to Realm Sync: 10.1.3.

replies.bodyText: not really just copying a previous release block which has this issue ... I'll update it
replies.author: nhachicha
